availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Falmouth, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Agnes M. Payne Roberts in Pendleton County on November 28, 1842. Father of James W. Roberts, John F. Roberts, Andrew J. Roberts, Rebecca J. Roberts, Jemmie E. Roberts, Emma A. Roberts, and Julia Roberts. Farmer in Falmouth in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, p. 3.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 28.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, Film #000272806.
